greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Simple triangle-stretching N X N -> N bijection: Inverse of A072732.
link: Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: (define (packA001477 x y) (/ (+ (expt (+ x y) 2) x (* 3 y)) 2))

(define (packA072733 x y) (cond ((<= x y) (let ((half-x (floor->exact (/ x 2)))) (packA001477 half-x (+ half-x (* 2 (- y (* 2 half-x) (modulo x 2))) (modulo x 2))))) (else (let ((half-y (floor->exact (/ y 2)))) (packA001477 (+ 1 half-y (* 2 (- (-1+ x) (* 2 half-y) (modulo y 2))) (modulo y 2)) half-y)))))
xref: Inverse: A072732, projections: A072738 & A072739, variant of the same theme: A072735. Cf. also A001477 and its projections A025581 & A002262.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 12 2002
